tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE online_activities (
	person_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	username TEXT,
	password TEXT,
	email TEXT,
	phone_number TEXT,
	birthdate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE VictimInfo (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE OnlineActivities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_id INT,
  activity_type VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (victim_id) REFERENCES VictimInfo(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
	victim_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	address VARCHAR(150),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE OnlineActivities (
	online_activity_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	victim_id INT,
	activity_type VARCHAR(50),
	activity_details TEXT,
	activity_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IdentityTheft (
	identity_theft_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	victim_id INT,
	personal_information TEXT,
	method_used VARCHAR(100),
	date_of_theft DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Victims (
    victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE PersonalInformation (
    information_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_id INT,
    address VARCHAR(150),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    social_security_number VARCHAR(30)
);
CREATE TABLE online_activities (victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY, activity_type VARCHAR(50), activity_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE personal_information (victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(100), social_security_number VARCHAR(20), address VARCHAR(150), phone_number VARCHAR(20), email VARCHAR(50), credit_card_number VARCHAR(20), bank_account_number VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE identity_theft_methods (method_id INT PRIMARY KEY, method_name VARCHAR(100), success_rate FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE identity_theft_logs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, method_id INT, victim_id INT, date_of_theft TIMESTAMP, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE theft_reports (report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, victim_id INT, date_reported TIMESTAMP, report_description TEXT);
